ygData.subject: Re: Hrmmm..
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh since early beta, in fact me and others found the first 2 dupe exploits, one involved dyeing with items in a sack and the other trading while crossing a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh since early beta, in fact me and others found the first 2 dupe
exploits, one involved dyeing with items in a sack and the other trading
while crossing a zone boundary, we also pissed a lot of people off cause we
reported it. Verant was VERY good to plug up most of these hole but not
every one is possible.
<-- Enigma -->
Tech Supervisor of The Door ISP
http://members.door.net/enigma
UIN:364996



-----Original Message-----
From: kurt walther [SMTP:itzkurt@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 3:44 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Re: Hrmmm..

From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>

uhm.. EQ is NOT exploit free.. people have been cheating/exploiting
since release. If you are naive enough to believe that no one is, then
you REALLY need to pull your head out of your ass.
